verses.verse: Again <S%H8671><s%>, in the ninth <S%H8141>year<s%>, in the <S%H6224>tenth<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%>, in the <S%H6218>tenth<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month<s%>, the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> came unto <S%H559>me<s%>, saying,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H3789>write<s%> thee the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3117>day<s%>, even of this <S%H6106>selfsame<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>: the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> <S%H5564>drew<s%> close unto <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> this <S%H6106>selfsame<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>.

And <S%H4911>utter<s%> a <S%H4912>parable<s%> unto the <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H559>them<s%>, Thus saith the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>, Set <S%H8239>on<s%> the <S%H5518>caldron<s%>, set it <S%H8239>on<s%>, and also <S%H3332>pour<s%> water into <S%H4325>it<s%>:

gather <S%H622><s%> the <S%H5409>pieces<s%> thereof into <S%H2896>it<s%>, even every good <S%H5409>piece<s%>, the <S%H3409>thigh<s%>, and the <S%H3802>shoulder<s%>; <S%H4390>fill<s%> it with the <S%H4005>choice<s%> <S%H6106>bones<s%>.

Take <S%H3947><s%> the <S%H4005>choice<s%> of the <S%H6629>flock<s%>, and also a pile of <S%H1754>wood<s%> for the <S%H6106>bones<s%> under the <S%H7570>caldron<s%>; make it boil <S%H7571>well<s%>; <S%H6106>yea<s%>, let the bones thereof be <S%H1310>boiled<s%> in the midst of <S%H8432>it<s%>.

Wherefore thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Jehovah<s%>: <S%H188>Woe<s%> to the <S%H1818>bloody<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%>, to the <S%H5518>caldron<s%> whose <S%H2457>rust<s%> is <S%H2457>therein<s%>, and whose rust is not gone <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H3318>it<s%>! take out of it <S%H5409>piece<s%> after <S%H5409>piece<s%>; No <S%H1486>lot<s%> is fallen upon <S%H5307>it<s%>.

For her <S%H1818>blood<s%> is in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H7760>her<s%>; she set it upon the <S%H6706>bare<s%> <S%H5553>rock<s%>; she <S%H8210>poured<s%> it not upon the <S%H776>ground<s%>, to <S%H3680>cover<s%> it with <S%H6083>dust<s%>.

That it may cause <S%H2534>wrath<s%> to come <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H5358>take<s%> <S%H5359>vengeance<s%>, I have <S%H5414>set<s%> her <S%H1818>blood<s%> upon the <S%H6706>bare<s%> <S%H5553>rock<s%>, that it should not be <S%H3680>covered<s%>.
Therefore thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Jehovah<s%>: <S%H188>Woe<s%> to the <S%H1818>bloody<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%>! I also will make the <S%H4071>pile<s%> <S%H1431>great<s%>.

Heap <S%H7235><s%> on the <S%H6086>wood<s%>, <S%H1814>make<s%> the <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H4841>hot<s%>, boil well the <S%H1320>flesh<s%>, and make <S%H7543>thick<s%> the <S%H4841>broth<s%>, and let the <S%H6106>bones<s%> be <S%H2787>burned<s%>.

Then <S%H5975>set<s%> it <S%H7386>empty<s%> upon the <S%H1513>coals<s%> <S%H3179>thereof<s%>, that it may be hot, and the <S%H5178>brass<s%> thereof may <S%H2787>burn<s%>, and that the <S%H2932>filthiness<s%> of it may be <S%H5413>molten<s%> in <S%H8432>it<s%>, that the <S%H2457>rust<s%> of it may be <S%H8552>consumed<s%>.

She hath <S%H3811>wearied<s%> herself with <S%H8383>toil<s%>; yet her <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H2457>rust<s%> goeth not <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H2457>her<s%>; her rust goeth not forth by <S%H784>fire<s%>.

In thy <S%H2932>filthiness<s%> is <S%H2154>lewdness<s%>: because I have <S%H2891>cleansed<s%> thee and thou wast not <S%H2891>cleansed<s%>, thou shalt not be <S%H2891>cleansed<s%> from thy <S%H2932>filthiness<s%> any <S%H2534>more<s%>, till I have caused my wrath toward thee to <S%H5117>rest<s%>.

I <S%H3068><s%>, Jehovah, have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H935>it<s%>: it shall come to pass, and I will <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H6544>it<s%>: I will not go back, neither will I <S%H2347>spare<s%>, neither will I <S%H5162>repent<s%>; according to thy <S%H1870>ways<s%>, and according to thy <S%H5949>doings<s%>, shall they <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H5002>thee<s%>, saith the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>.
Also the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> came unto <S%H559>me<s%>, saying,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H3947>behold<s%>, I take away from thee the <S%H4261>desire<s%> of thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> with a <S%H4046>stroke<s%>: yet thou shalt neither <S%H5594>mourn<s%> nor <S%H1058>weep<s%>, neither shall thy <S%H1832>tears<s%> run <S%H935>down<s%>.

Sigh <S%H602><s%>, but <S%H1826>not<s%> <S%H6213>aloud<s%>, make no <S%H60>mourning<s%> for the <S%H4191>dead<s%>; <S%H2280>bind<s%> thy <S%H6287>headtire<s%> upon <S%H5275>thee<s%>, and put thy shoes <S%H7760>upon<s%> thy <S%H7272>feet<s%>, and <S%H5844>cover<s%> not thy <S%H8222>lips<s%>, and <S%H398>eat<s%> not the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of <S%H582>men<s%>.

So I <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto the <S%H5971>people<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%>; and at <S%H6153>even<s%> my <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%>; and I <S%H6213>did<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> as I was <S%H6680>commanded<s%>.
And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H5046>me<s%>, Wilt thou not tell us what these things are to <S%H6213>us<s%>, that thou doest so?
Then I <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1697>them<s%>, The word of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> came unto <S%H559>me<s%>, saying,

Speak <S%H559><s%> unto the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>: <S%H2490>Behold<s%>, I will profane my <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%>, the <S%H1347>pride<s%> of your <S%H5797>power<s%>, the <S%H4261>desire<s%> of your <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, and that which your <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H4263>pitieth<s%>; and your <S%H1121>sons<s%> and your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> whom ye have <S%H5800>left<s%> behind shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%>.
And ye shall <S%H6213>do<s%> as I have <S%H6213>done<s%>: ye shall not <S%H5844>cover<s%> your <S%H8222>lips<s%>, nor <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of <S%H582>men<s%>.

And your <S%H6287>tires<s%> shall be upon your <S%H7218>heads<s%>, and your <S%H5275>shoes<s%> upon your <S%H7272>feet<s%>: ye shall not <S%H5594>mourn<s%> nor <S%H1058>weep<s%>; but ye shall pine <S%H4743>away<s%> in your <S%H5771>iniquities<s%>, and <S%H5098>moan<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> toward <S%H251>another<s%>.

Thus shall <S%H3168>Ezekiel<s%> be unto you a <S%H4159>sign<s%>; according to all that he hath <S%H6213>done<s%> shall ye <S%H6213>do<s%>: when this <S%H935>cometh<s%>, then shall ye <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>.

And <S%H1121>thou<s%>, son of <S%H120>man<s%>, shall it not be in the <S%H3117>day<s%> when I <S%H3947>take<s%> from them their <S%H4581>strength<s%>, the <S%H4885>joy<s%> of their <S%H8597>glory<s%>, the <S%H4261>desire<s%> of their <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, and that whereupon they <S%H4853>set<s%> their <S%H5315>heart<s%>, their <S%H1121>sons<s%> and their <S%H1323>daughters<s%>,
that in that <S%H3117>day<s%> he that <S%H6412>escapeth<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> unto <S%H2045>thee<s%>, to cause thee to hear it with thine <S%H241>ears<s%>?

In that <S%H3117>day<s%> shall thy <S%H6310>mouth<s%> be <S%H6605>opened<s%> to him that is <S%H6412>escaped<s%>, and thou shalt <S%H1696>speak<s%>, and be no more <S%H481>dumb<s%>: so shalt thou be a <S%H4159>sign<s%> unto <S%H3045>them<s%>; and they shall know that I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
